---

Sealed with a vial containing the ashes from your childhood home, you traded the memories of your early life to stay focused on the present, allowing you to avoid distractions during combat. Once per day, from any distance, the entity that holds your _bargained contract_ can take one of your memories. This functions as a casting of [_modify memory_](/Spells.aspx?ID=200) that doesn't grant you a saving throw and can't be reversed by any means without stealing the memory back first.
